comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Yes, it is amazing - I think it was a dead link before.  Fascinating to see all around the innards too - most of the fittings must  have been changed over the years,  but never mind that!  I am constantly surprised at where the interweb can take us ...
